methods: abstract int getAvailableAutoMatchSlots() Return the maximum number of available automatch slots for this invitation.

abstract int getInvitationType() Retrieve the type of this Invitation.
abstract Participant getInviter() Retrieve the Participant who created this Invitation.
abstract int getVariant() Retrieve the variant specified for this Invitation, if any.
